answers.answer: I don't know much about Atkins. While taking an anatomy class I did learn, though, that it does not provide all of the nutrients that your body needs. While it can result in weight loss it also changes the ph balance of your blood and can even send your body in a state similar to that of diabetes.Don't hold me to it, though. I'm sure Quix knows more about it.~Ley

question: YOU MENTIONED DR. ATKINS.  I FOLLOWED HIS DIET FOR SEVERAL YEARS AND LOST WEIGHT.  I WENT OFF OF IT BECAUSE THE REPORTS OF PEOPLE AGAINST THIS WAY OF EATING SCARE ME.DO YOU FOLLOW THE ATKINS WAY OF EATING?LA
title: Not MS but Atkins.....QUIX
